channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024071977
item.description:
Report X-2024071977

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-02T18:16:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-21
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 7/21/2024 at approximately 1100, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 261690 at the ramp facility in Anchorage, reporting a dangerous goods spill. The shipment consisted of 8 metal cans, each individually overpacked in a fiberboard box, and then all were overpacked onto a pallet. One the packages was reportedly damaged due to mishandling, resulting in spillage. The damaged package was placed in a salvage drum and the entire shipment is being held, awating an amended shipper's declaration to be returned to the shipper.

item.title: Report X-2024072178
item.description:
Report X-2024072178

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-31T21:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-03
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Alaska Airline
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While using the X-ray saw a battery shape thing inside the shipment but it was undeclared. did physical search to confirm and found a rechargeable sealed lead-acid battery in the shipment undeclared
